meanings.definition: To create or use slogans in a persuasive manner.
meanings.sent1: The company sloganizes to attract more customers.
meanings.sent2: She sloganizes her products to make them memorable.
meanings.sent3: The cat sloganizes its cuteness to get more treats.
meanings.sent4: His smile sloganizes happiness to everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The colorful poster sloganizes the upcoming event effectively.

meanings.definition: To promote or advertise using slogans.
meanings.sent1: The team sloganizes their new campaign for the charity event.
meanings.sent2: They sloganize their brand with catchy phrases.
meanings.sent3: The birds sloganize their chirping to invite others to join in.
meanings.sent4: The sun sloganizes the beauty of the morning with its warm rays.
meanings.sent5: The billboard sloganizes the benefits of the product in bold letters.
